TEXT.TITLE: BEI HOLDINGS LTD <BEIH> 1ST QTR JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 13 cts vs eight cts Net 1,364,712 vs 881,082 Rev 11.6 mln vs 11.5 mln NOTE: Qtr includes extraordinary gain of 586,826 dlrs, or six cts a share, versus 183,850 dlrs or two cts a share in fiscal 1986's first qtr. Reuter
